segments.text: Hi Julie , how are things going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything is great , Tad . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tad , I'm pretty hungry right now . Want to walk over and check out the food table ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Julie , do you know who that woman is over there by the window ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is Mary . I heard that she's just moved in with Lee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought that he was with Malia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that relationship is history . Malia hooked up with a guy she met on holiday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bet that Lee wasn't too happy with that !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , he was OK with it . They hadn't been getting along too well .
segments.speaker: S2
